SEARCH:

クラス SnackMachine

java.lang.Object
SnackMachine
public class SnackMachine extends Object
The SnackMachine class represents a snack machine that contains packets of crisps.

  • コンストラクタの概要

    コンストラクタ
    コンストラクタ
    説明
    SnackMachine(int capacityOfMachine, int costOfAPacket)
    Creates a SnackMachine with the specified capacity and cost of individual packet

  • メソッドの概要

    修飾子とタイプ
    メソッド
    説明
    void
    addPack(PackOfCrisps pack)
    Adds a packet of crisps to the machine.
    PackOfCrisps
    buyPack(String flavour)
    Buys a packet of crisps from the machine of a specificed flavour.
    int
    countPacks(String flavour)
    Tells us the amount of packets in the machine that are a certain flavour
    void
    describe()
    Prints the current state of the machine to console as follows This snack machine has (n) packets of crisps left and has taken (m) pennies in payment
    int
    getCost()
    Tells us the cost of a singular packet
    void
    insertMoney(Penny penny)
    Inserts a penny into the machine If the penny is already in the machine a suitable message is output to console and the penny object is not added.

    クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • SnackMachine

      public SnackMachine(int capacityOfMachine, int costOfAPacket)
      Creates a SnackMachine with the specified capacity and cost of individual packet
      パラメータ:
      capacityOfMachine - An integer representing the capacity of the machine (i.e. how many packets can it hold)
      costOfAPacket - An integer representing the cost of an individual packet

  • メソッドの詳細

    • describe

      public void describe()
      Prints the current state of the machine to console as follows This snack machine has (n) packets of crisps left and has taken (m) pennies in payment

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Tells us the cost of a singular packet
      戻り値:
      An integer representing the cost of an individual packet

    • countPacks

      public int countPacks(String flavour)
      Tells us the amount of packets in the machine that are a certain flavour
      パラメータ:
      flavour - flavour of the packets that are being counted
      戻り値:
      An integer representing the amount of packets (of flavour) in machine

    • buyPack

      public PackOfCrisps buyPack(String flavour)
      Buys a packet of crisps from the machine of a specificed flavour. If the packets of crisps is not in the machine, or if there is not enough money in the machince to make a purchase, then sutiable error messages are output to console and null is returned.
      パラメータ:
      flavour - flavour of the packets that is being purchased
      戻り値:
      The packet of crisps that has been purchased or null if the packet could not be purchased

    • addPack

      public void addPack(PackOfCrisps pack)
      Adds a packet of crisps to the machine. The packet will not be added if the machine is full or the machine already contains the packet
      パラメータ:
      pack - The packet of crisps being added

    • insertMoney

      public void insertMoney(Penny penny)
      Inserts a penny into the machine If the penny is already in the machine a suitable message is output to console and the penny object is not added.
      パラメータ:
      penny - The penny being entered into the machine
